control.label: #SkinTranslation.Translations.KeyboardShortcuts.Label
DriveFreeSpace

control.description: Drive Free Space Help - Enlarge image
control.label: #SkinTranslation.Translations.EnlargeImage.Label

Here is some information about DriveFreeSpace. If installed and configured correctly, this plugin is able to display a lot of information about your attached drives. To configure the drive(s) you want to display, open MPConfig -> Plugins and navigate to the process plugin "DriveFreeSpace". Click on the button "Configure" and you should see a configuration window like this (without the coloured rectangles):

controls.control:
label Help Text 0 965 955 520 510 Inside the red rectangle the available drives are listed. Select the ones you want to display. After selecting the drive(s), you now specify the information to be displayed (blue rectangle). This is a bit tricky, the properties to select from are shown when hovering over the field in the blue rectangle. To get the most information (including the free space for recordings in HD), you could use this example string:
850 200 left font9 skyblue conditional !skin.hassetting(#skin.keyboard.shortcuts)+skin.hassetting(#skin.drivefreespaceHelp)

label Help Text 0 630 625 700 723 %drive% %labelbrackets% %totalspace% GB total / %usedspace% GB used %freespace% %unit% free (%fspercent%) (for approx. %rectimeleft% hours HD) 1520 200 left font9 lightgray conditional !skin.hassetting(#skin.keyboard.shortcuts)+skin.hassetting(#skin.drivefreespaceHelp)
